description: Pick up the nut and place it onto the peg.
Grasp a nut, align it, and drop it on its post.
Lift the loose nut, hover above the peg, then lower to assemble.
Find the nut, orient it, and finish the assembly on the stand.
Complete the nut-on-peg assembly from random starting poses.

Shoot the basketball so it drops cleanly into the basket.
